summary: A series of films about how humans have been colonized by the machines we have built. Although we don't realize it, the way we see everything in the world today is through the eyes of the computers.
cast: Adam Curtis|Stewart Brand|Peder Anker|Tord Björk|Sam Bledsoe|Daniel Botkin|Barbara Branden|Nathaniel Branden|Loren Carpenter|Rachel Carpenter|Jay Forrester|Randall Gibson|Al Gore|Molly Hollenbach|Kevin Kelly|John McCaskey|Joan Mitchell|Kevin O'Connor|Keniche Ohmae|Steward Pickett|Kathleen Price|Stephen Roach|Robert Rubin|Michael Ruse|James Schwartz|Peter Schwartz|Joseph Stiglitz|Dave Swift|Peter J. title: All Watched Over by Machines of Loving Grace
